channel.description: Add Universal Logout to your app Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Update title Error codes belong in a reference doc not in this doc cc: @Dan Maharry Links to original docs: - Build Universal Logout for your app: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-universal-logout-overview/ Include material from UL Blog workshop? Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
